header.title: Lead Developer / Full Stack Developer (React / Node.js)

profile.title: Profile
profile.description:
Experienced Full Stack Developer with over 7 years of experience creating high-performance, optimized web solutions. Skilled in quickly identifying and resolving bugs, ensuring stability and the quality of every project.
As a Lead Dev and Developer, I guarantee the productivity and efficiency required to achieve expected project outcomes, adapting rapidly to new environments and technologies. Specialized in React, Angular, TypeScript and JavaScript, always seeking optimization and performance by applying best practices to deliver fast, scalable and maintainable applications.

areas.title: Technical Skills
skills: Front-end Frameworks: React, Angular, React Native (mobile)
DevOps & CI/CD: Git, GitLab, Docker, Jenkins

education.title: Education
list: 2017 - 2018: Master 2 Computer Science - Lumi√®re Lyon 2 University
2012 - 2017: Bachelor's Degree in Interactive Media Design - Icesi University, Colombia

soop.project: PROJECT: Restructuring and redesign of web and mobile applications, in collaboration with the UX/UI team, to provide a smooth user experience and ensure optimization and performance of applications.

missions.title: Missions
list: Complete delivery of an operational web and mobile application, covering design, development, deployment and support.
Application architecture clarified through participation in technical decisions, ensuring a coherent and evolving roadmap.
Reliable data exchanges through the implementation of robust web services and integration of internal/external APIs, ensuring unified flows.
Transformation of UX/UI mockups into final interfaces, preserving design quality and improving user experience.
Maintaining a high level of service: preventive maintenance, planned evolutions, performance optimizations and continuous bug reduction.
Strengthening collective quality through systematic code reviews and exhaustive functional tests, reducing regressions in production.

results.title: Results
results.description: Reduced incident rate, significant traffic growth, increased user satisfaction and improved application performance.

projects.title: PROJECT HUMOON: Development of a web and mobile application based on feedback from the user's professional network, which allows exploring new opportunities and choosing the appropriate career direction.

missions.title: Missions
list: Transformation of UX/UI mockups into final interfaces, preserving design quality and improving user experience.
Maintaining a high level of service: preventive maintenance, planned evolutions, performance optimizations and continuous bug reduction.
Rapid and effective bug resolution, ensuring stability and reliability of applications in production.
Automated and secure deployment of applications, ensuring smooth production deployment without service interruption.
Strengthening collective quality through code reviews and functional tests, reducing regressions in production.

results.title: Results
results.description: Operational applications, delivery of applications meeting business requirements, customer satisfaction thanks to responsiveness and respect for delivery deadlines.

projects.title: PROJECT FranceAgriMer - VISIOCaptures: Development of a mobile application that replaces paper-based declaration of fishing sheets and logs for captains of vessels under 12 meters.

missions.title: Missions
list: Supervision and coordination of a team of 2 developers, structuring the roadmap and ensuring deliveries aligned with business requirements.
Continuous optimization of application performance, reducing loading times and improving user experience.
Maintaining a high level of service: preventive maintenance, planned evolutions and continuous application optimization.
Task estimation and breakdown for each sprint, optimizing planning and work distribution within the team.
Strengthening collective quality through code reviews and functional tests.
Deployment and publication of the application on Google Play and App Store, ensuring smooth distribution and compliance with quality standards.

results.title: Results
results.description: Mobile application faithful to the mockup and compliant with business requirements, significant reduction in incidents thanks to regular monitoring, successful supervision of the developer team.

projects.title: PROJECT ORYX - eXpanded: Mobile application that allows sharing contacts and mandates between independent negotiators.

missions.title: Missions
list: Supervision and coordination of a team of 3 developers, structuring the roadmap and ensuring deliveries aligned with business requirements.
Complete development of the mobile application, covering design, architecture, development and integration of all functionalities.
Transformation of UX/UI mockups into final interfaces, preserving design quality and improving user experience.
Rapid and effective bug resolution, ensuring stability and reliability of the application in production.
Deployment and publication of the application on Google Play and App Store, ensuring smooth distribution and compliance with quality standards.

results.title: Results
results.description: Delivery of the mobile application compliant with business requirements.

projects.title: PROJECT RTE - DECOFER: Railway counting device.

missions.title: Missions
list: Development of a web application using Angular 4+, implementing best practices and advanced framework features.
Continuous optimization of application performance, reducing loading times, improving responsiveness and overall user experience.
Precise integration of screens from mockups provided by UX/UI designers, transforming designs into functional interfaces while preserving visual quality and user experience.

results.title: Results
results.description: Operational application, significant reduction in production regressions thanks to regular monitoring.

projects.title: PROJECT RTE - MOOSE: Sending forecasts of electricity consumption and production in France daily to the European STA (Short Term Adequacy) service.

missions.title: Missions
list: Complete development of the web application, covering design, architecture, development and integration of all functionalities.
Implementation of robust and performant web services, ensuring reliable and secure data exchanges between different application components.
Integration of internal and external APIs to unify data flows from diverse sources, ensuring coherent and reliable synchronization.
Implementation of Angular services for automatic data integration and file generation, optimizing processes and reducing manual interventions.
Maintaining a high level of service: preventive maintenance, planned evolutions and continuous application optimization.

results.title: Results
results.description: Operational application, customer satisfaction thanks to responsiveness and respect for delivery deadlines.
